column1:
The most damning evidence that Donald Trump is unfit to be Command-in-Chief are his own words, 0, 16
He mocks the sacrifices of parents who lost a child to war but cant identify any sacrifices hes ever made for our nation, 16, 39
He laments that he always wanted a Purple Heart butxa0lied about giving to veterans charities that support those whove sacrificed, 39, 59
He lacks the most basic understanding of foreign policy and thinks that hes smarter than our professional soldiers because he went to a military high school decades ago, 59, 87

Trump wont stand behind our troops and have their backs Hillary will
Shes ready and Im proud to join veterans across our state and nation who are supporting her."
